channel.title: Keycloak on Lean Deep Tech blog
channel.description: Recent content in Keycloak on Lean Deep Tech blog

item.title: Configure Keycloak to secure your apps and API endpoints
item.description: In this brief article we are going to create a basic realm in Keycloak to secure an API. It’s a very minimal setup to quickly get started and secure your app and API. No RBAC, no security defense, and no Google/ Facebook Connect… configs are explained in this article. I will probably create other articles about these subjets later as I am extensively leveraging Keycloak features. There is indeed no need to setup a complexe Identity and Access Management tool like Keycloak if you are not going to leverage it…
